summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of ICMS new features: Settings page (3 tabs), Enhanced SKU fields, Enhanced Import Orders (Edit/Delete/Duplicate), and PO dropdown bug fix. All features working correctly.
critical_code_review_comments: Settings page well-implemented with 3 tabs (Company, Documents, Dropdowns) and proper data-testid attributes
SKU form includes all new fields: Category, Adhesive Type, Liner Color, Shipping Mark, Marking
Import Orders has Edit/Delete/Duplicate buttons visible on all order rows
Create Order dialog includes Shipping Date field and SKU search functionality
PO dropdown bug fixed - both Actual Loading and Financial modules now include Draft status orders
seed_data_creation: Used existing data: 5 Import Orders, 7 SKUs
context_for_next_testing_agent: All new features tested and working. Settings page at /settings with Company/Documents/Dropdowns tabs. SKU form has new fields (adhesive_type, liner_color, shipping_mark, marking). Import Orders has Edit/Delete/Duplicate buttons and Shipping Date field. PO dropdown bug fixed in ActualLoading.js (line 44) and FinancialDashboard.js (line 53) by including 'Draft' status.

features: Settings nav item visible in sidebar for Owner role
Company tab: Company Name, Email, Phone, Address fields
Documents tab: Header Text, Footer Text, Show Duty Rate toggle
Dropdowns tab: Category, Adhesive Types, Liner Colors, Shipping Marks editors
Edit button on each order row (5 buttons found)
Delete button on each order row (5 buttons found)
Duplicate button on each order row (5 buttons found)
Shipping Date field in create/edit dialog
SKU search input for item selection
Actual Loading: PO dropdown shows 5 orders (including Draft)
Financial: PO dropdown shows 5 orders (including Draft)
